description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. It's an ultimate showdown between Santa and RoboSanta. Defeat the Grunch, Snowman, a other characters as you work your way to face the Ultimate Boss. Battle your friends in 2 player mode to prove who is the true king of Krismas fighting is. Will you make it to the top or will you be Santalitized?  Featuring an all 8 bit soundtrack and vintage style old school graphics.
description.short: It's an ultimate showdown between Santa and RoboSanta. Defeat the Grunch, Snowman, a other characters as you work your way to face the Ultimate Boss. Battle your friends in 2 player mode to prove who is the true king of Krismas fighting is. Will you make it to the top or will you be Santalitized?  Featuring an all 8 bit soundtrack and vintage style old school graphics.
